summary: AI Command Center restructuring testing complete. All requested features verified working: (1) Header search bar removed, (2) AI chat input with ticker auto-detect, (3) Clickable ticker links in AI responses open modal. Backend POST /api/assistant/chat returns GPT-4o analysis for deep queries.

issues: Shows 'Disconnected' status - expected for WebSocket quotes stream (known issue, not related to AI/REST API)

passed_tests: Header does NOT have ticker search bar (correctly removed)
Header has connection status indicators (WS status, IB Gateway)
AI Command Center has chat input with placeholder 'Ask AI anything or type a ticker (AAPL, NVDA)...'
AI Command Center shows quick action buttons: Bot Status, My Performance, Market News, Rule Check
Typing bare ticker 'AAPL' auto-expands to full analysis request
POST /api/assistant/chat returns detailed AI analysis from Ollama/GPT-4o
AI response contains clickable ticker links with ArrowUpRight icon
Clicking ticker link (e.g., ticker-link-AAPL) opens Ticker Detail Modal
Ticker Detail Modal shows comprehensive analysis: price, scores, trading recommendation, Buy/Short buttons
Tab navigation works: Signals, Command, Analytics
Command tab layout: Trading Bot at top, AI Command Center in middle, Bot Trades/Earnings below
Market Intelligence panel on right side with real report content
critical_code_review_comments: AICommandPanel.jsx correctly implements ticker auto-detect: /^(\$?[A-Z]{1,5})$/ expands to full analysis prompt
TickerAwareText component wraps known tickers (~70 symbols) in clickable TickerLink buttons
TickerLink has correct data-testid='ticker-link-{SYMBOL}' for testing
HeaderBar.jsx correctly removed search bar, clean header with AI Coach + status indicators
Chat layout restructured: input sticky at top, messages below, then Bot Trades/Earnings sections

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are real - Ollama for standard queries, GPT-4o for deep analysis

context_for_next_testing_agent: AI Command Center restructuring verified. Key test data-testids: ai-command-panel, ai-chat-input, ai-chat-send, chat-messages, ticker-link-{SYMBOL}, ai-coach-shortcut-btn, tab-coach, tab-trading, tab-analytics. Known tickers list has ~70 symbols including AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, TSLA, etc. Ticker auto-detect triggers on bare 1-5 uppercase letters. Deep queries (analyze, compare, strategy, risk) route to GPT-4o.

ai_command_center.chat_input_placeholder: Ask AI anything or type a ticker (AAPL, NVDA)...
ai_command_center.ticker_auto_detect: Works - bare ticker expands to full analysis request

api_verified.response_provider: ollama for standard, GPT-4o for deep
api_verified.response_quality: Detailed trading analysis with strategy recommendations
